ModMetaData.name: RePower Rimatomics Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Rimatomics utilities for using the RePower system:
Rimatomics research bench (10W Idle, 600W Active) Rimatomics machining table (10W Idle, 800W Active) Reactor console (10W Idle, 400W Active) Weapons console (10W Idle, 400W Active)
Support-chat here: https://s.team/chat/KUDuzMGR
